elfoAPI.calendar.schedule

Class Schedule

  • java.lang.Object
    • elfoAPI.calendar.ElfoCalendar<ScheduleDay>
      • elfoAPI.calendar.schedule.Schedule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IIdentificable, java.io.Serializable

    public class Schedule
extends ElfoCalendar<ScheduleDay>
implements IIdentificable
    Representa uma agenda de eventos Esta agenda so pode ser criada pelo repositorio de Schedule

    0.1.18
    Author:
    Ezequias Moises dos Santos Silva
